text: The Jehovahs Witnesses compiled a database of alleged child abusers, then paid millions of dollars to keep it secret. Now a former Witness is leaking stolen documents to expose the allegations. By @DQuenqua
author: denisewills

text: I do this so that you guys don’t have to. It’s one of the services I offer.
author: denisewills

text:
"The end justified the means. The healthy baby justified the lie." 

Stunning writing by @sarahzhang about how DNA testing is exposing family secrets and reshaping identities.
author: denisewills

text:
What’s so fascinating in this (amazing) @sarahzhang story is the variety of responses the half-siblings have had to the discovery of their paternity.
https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2019/04/fertility-doctor-donald-cline-secret-children/583249/?utm_source=feed …
author: denisewills
